summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4428 for the improvement of alley in Block 31, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 4, being the alley between 17th Avenue North and 18th Avenue North, from East Galer Street to East Highland Drive, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52333, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
